roleset.name: to send into a stupor
roleset.note: DAZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'daze' based on internet research, membership in VN. VerbNet class 31.1. (from daze.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: The bright lights of the FBI interrogation room dazed John.
example.arg: The bright lights of the FBI interrogation room

example.name: all arguments
example.text: During the interrogation, the FBI dazed John with bright flood lights.
